(11) tetraoxosulphate (1V) solution to deposit 21.3 g of 
copper. The correct equation for the reaction is

C. 2X(s) +2CuSO4(aq)  Cu(s) + X2(SO4) (aq) 
D. 2X(s) +3CuSO4(aq) 3Cu(s)  + X2(SO)3(aq)

C. 1:2 D. 1:4
